text: this is a spider personality test so is
this how long a spider stays curled up
after a puff of air tells how bold it is
and how it responds to it poke tells how
aggressive it is scientists at the
University of Pittsburgh brought home
these spiders from South Africa
constructed artificial colonies
researchers studied individual spiders
to see how their sizes and behaviors
affected group behavior but they found
was that smaller spiders did more web
building all spiders did repair work on
the web and the spiders in the best body
condition were the least likely to go
out and collect prey that had been
trapped and the groups turned out to be
different depending on their composition
colonies with more variation were on the
whole more aggressive all the suggested
spiders are more like bees and ants than

they're not planning on world domination
